name: F2. CHANGES TO TERMS OF SERVICE
paragraph_1: The company should clearly disclose that it provides notice and documentation to users when it changes its terms of service.

cells.value: Does the company clearly disclose that it notifies users about changes to its terms of service?
Does the company clearly disclose how it will directly notify users of changes?
Does the company clearly disclose the timeframe within which it provides notification prior to changes coming into effect?
Does the company maintain a public archive or change log?
